name: Beat Dungeon
description:
Try to survive a dungeon where the monsters move to the beat.

This game was made as part of the First Extra Credits Game Design Jam.

Instructions

Use arrow keys or a joystick to move your character as far as possible. Avoid enemies (who move to the beat of your song) while your music plays. Get as far as possible without running out of health (hearts) before the end of your song for a high score! Attack your enemies by using the 'Z' and 'X' keys or the shoulder buttons on the game pad.

Acknowledgements

This game uses music from Bensound.com, Kevin MacLeod, l3v3ls and Vexento.

More Music

If you get the source code from https://github.com/BEN1JEN/beat-dungeon you can add your own music and play with it.
